overview:
Reagan Pollack - Co-Founder, WorldMusicLink® Corporation

Mr. Pollack is a Co-founder of WorldMusicLink® Corporation (www.WorldMusicLink.com) - the first global music industry e-marketplace that connects thousands of Music Industry Professionals, Companies and Music Talent in over 50 countries of all genres, and provides tools that expedite new talent recruitment A&R, brand / music promotion, communication, and new business deals.

Mr. Pollack is also an accomplished musician, songwriter, and former disc-jockey (KSPB 91.9FM) at Stevenson.

He holds a cum laude honors Business Administration degree with a concentration in Entrepreneurship from Babson College (Wellesley, MA) - rated the #1 Business School for Entrepreneurship in the World - U.S. News & World Report.
